message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you, and this is a fair starting point for negotiations.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of this product. How about we meet halfway and settle at $12,500?

I'm still interested in the product, but I think $11,500 is a fair price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous discussion, but I don't think I can go any higher than that. Would you be willing to accept $11,500?
